TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed UnmanagedType extends System.Enum

summary.span: 識別如何封送處理參數或欄位至 Unmanaged 程式碼。

span.span: Identifies how to marshal parameters or fields to unmanaged code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用列舉型別與屬性來指定如何類型會封送處理期間與 unmanaged 程式碼的互通性。Use the enumeration with the attribute to specify how types are marshaled during interoperation with unmanaged code. 若要使用在.NET Framework 中，無法使用的簡單實值類型 （I1、 I2、 I4、 i8、r8 R4，、 U2、 U4 和 U8），不受管理類型和各種其他類型的程式碼封送處理，您可以使用這個列舉型別。You can use this enumeration to marshal code using simple value types (I1, I2, I4, I8, R4, R8, U2, U4, and U8), unmanaged types that are unavailable in the .NET Framework, and various miscellaneous types. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[與 Unmanaged 程式碼互通](~/docs/framework/interop/index.md)。For more information, see [Interoperating with Unmanaged Code](~/docs/framework/interop/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼片段示範如何宣告，managed 的程式碼中實作的 COM 元件的 unmanaged 的介面。The following code fragment demonstrates how to declare, in managed source code, an unmanaged interface implemented by a COM component. 屬性會防止`IMyStorage`從 com 傳回用於匯出的介面The attribute prevents the `IMyStorage` interface from being exported back for use by COM. （COM 用戶端應該使用現有的 COM 元件直接）。在此範例中，指定多個成員，表示使用原始的 COM 介面的型別。(COM clients should use the existing COM component directly.) In this example, specifies several members, which represent the types used by the original COM interface. [!code-cpp[ImprovedInteropSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ImprovedInteropSnippets/CPP/codefile2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[ImprovedInteropSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ImprovedInteropSnippets/CS/codefile2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ImprovedInteropSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ImprovedInteropSnippets/VB/codefile2.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.UnmanagedType AnsiBStr = int32(35)
AnsiBStr = 35

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Marshalling as AnsiBStr may be unavailable in future releases.")

summary.span: 固定長度、單一位元組的 ANSI 字元字串。

span.span: An ANSI character string that is a length-prefixed single byte.

summary.span: 您可以在 資料類型上使用這個成員。

span.span: You can use this member on the data type.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.UnmanagedType AsAny = int32(40)
AsAny = 40

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Marshalling arbitrary types may be unavailable in future releases. Please specify the type you wish to marshal as.")

summary.span: 動態 (Dynamic) 類型，在執行階段判斷物件的類型，並封送處理物件為該類型。

span.span: A dynamic type that determines the type of an object at run time and marshals the object as that type.

summary.span: 這個成員僅對平台叫用方法有效。

span.span: This member is valid for platform invoke methods only.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.UnmanagedType Bool = int32(2)
Bool = 2

summary.span: 4 位元組的布林值 ( != 0, = 0)。

span.span: A 4-byte Boolean value ( != 0, = 0).

summary.span: 這是 Win32 BOOL 類型。

span.span: This is the Win32 BOOL type.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.UnmanagedType BStr = int32(19)
BStr = 19

summary.span: 固定長度雙位元組的 Unicode 字元字串。

span.span: A Unicode character string that is a length-prefixed double byte.

summary.span: 您可以在 資料類型上使用這個成員，這是 COM 中的預設字串。

span.span: You can use this member, which is the default string in COM, on the data type.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.UnmanagedType ByValArray = int32(30)
ByValArray = 30

summary.span: 將 屬性設為 時，必須設定 欄位以指出陣列中的元素數目。

span.span: When the property is set to , the field must be set to indicate the number of elements in the array.

summary.span: 需要區別字串類型時， 欄位可以選擇性地包含陣列元素的 。

span.span: The field can optionally contain the of the array elements when it is necessary to differentiate among string types.

summary.span: 唯有當陣列的元素在結構中顯示為欄位時，您才能在該陣列上使用這個 。

span.span: You can use this only on an array that whose elements appear as fields in a structure.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.UnmanagedType ByValTStr = int32(23)
ByValTStr = 23

summary.span: 使用於出現在結構中的內嵌 (Inline) 固定長度字元陣列。

span.span: Used for in-line, fixed-length character arrays that appear within a structure.

summary.span: 與 搭配使用的字元類型是由套用至包含結構之 屬性的 引數所決定。

span.span: The character type used with is determined by the argument of the attribute applied to the containing structure.

summary.span: 一律使用 欄位來指出陣列大小。

span.span: Always use the field to indicate the size of the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET framework ByValTStr 類型的行為類似 C 樣式]、 [固定大小結構內的字串 (例如`char s[5]`)。.NET Framework ByValTStr types behave like C-style, fixed-size strings inside a structure (for example, `char s[5]`). Managed 程式碼中的行為不同於 Microsoft Visual Basic 6.0 行為，不是 null 終止 (例如`MyString As String * 5`)。The behavior in managed code differs from the Microsoft Visual Basic 6.0 behavior, which is not null terminated (for example, `MyString As String * 5`).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.UnmanagedType LPArray = int32(42)
LPArray = 42

summary.span: 指向 C-style 陣列第一個項目的指標。

span.span: A pointer to the first element of a C-style array.

summary.span: 當從 Managed 程式碼封送處理至 Unmanaged 程式碼時，陣列的長度是由 Managed 陣列的長度來判斷。

span.span: When marshaling from managed to unmanaged code, the length of the array is determined by the length of the managed array.

summary.span: 從 Unmanaged 程式碼封送處理至 Managed 程式碼時，會從 和 欄位判斷陣列的長度，在需要區別字串類型時，也可以選擇是否要在後面加上陣列中元素的 Unmanaged 類型。

span.span: When marshaling from unmanaged to managed code, the length of the array is determined from the and fields, optionally followed by the unmanaged type of the elements within the array when it is necessary to differentiate among string types.

summary.span: 平台相依字元字串：在 Windows 98 上為 ANSI on，在 Windows NT 與 Windows XP 上為 Unicode。

summary.span: 因為不支援匯出 類型的字串，所以只有進行平台叫用才支援這個值，若是 COM Interop 則不支援。

span.span: This value is supported only for platform invoke and not for COM interop, because exporting a string of type is not supported.

LPWStr = 21

summary.span: 2 位元組、以 Null 結束的 Unicode 字元字串。

span.span: A 2-byte, null-terminated Unicode character string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，您無法使用 LPWStr 值與 unmanaged 字串除非已建立的字串，使用未受管理`CoTaskMemAlloc`函式。Note that you cannot use the LPWStr value with an unmanaged string unless the string was created by using the unmanaged `CoTaskMemAlloc` function.
